ygData.subject: RE: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: Haha! This could be said about anything, my friend (the IQ test comment). Personally, this whole conversation is not needed. All I have to say about it is
ygData.messageBody:
Haha! This could be said about anything, my friend (the IQ test comment).

Personally, this whole conversation is not needed. All I have to say about
it is this: Nick, no one cares about this but you. And, where I'm wrong
about this, the only other people that care are those that want to prove you
wrong.

Can we please just stop this conversation? The laptop thread I was fine
with. Not that I read much of it, but it had some good info in the thread.
Nick's "bitch" thread is way overdue to die. Please, let it.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark S. Foster [ mailto:markf@... <mailto:markf@...>
]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 4:50 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <mailto:EQCheats@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Sean.Clark@... <mailto:Sean.Clark@...>



Dear Nick

hahaha, This person does not know too much about the internet. Ever
hear about Message Rules? You can have emails BLOCKED you know. Now, I
don't know what that person wrote to you, But there's nothing really a
court can do about this. I know. I work for a ISP, and just about all you
can do is get there account terminated from that ISP. Now if I was getting
crap mail like that. It's going right to my Blocked list to be deleted of
the server.


*wishes people had to take a IQ test to be able to get on the internet*

----- Original Message -----
From: Nick <mailto:brutalny@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <mailto:EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 1:36 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Sean.Clark@... <mailto:Sean.Clark@...>

Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my lawyers request I
had warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee would be
exempted to his university/his parents. He sent me an email this morning
that was lengthy and I didn't even bother reading it. Again (to the people
of the list), do not send me private emails. Mr. Clark is going to have to
go to small claims court because of his actions.
